transcript: I've had two nose operations and I probably still need another one the first doctor I ever showed my inside of my nose to he refused to operate on me he was like this is up you need like a super specialist so into that guy and he was like I'll give it my best shot and he gave it his best shot he was like let me have a second round it's like all right did it again and now I have like one of two nostrils before this I had like 100 couldn't breathe out of one at like 15 airflow in the other like I couldn't breathe at all this is the only way I can breathe unless I do this I can't breathe out of that nostril
